title: THURSDAY 3/25 - Buccaneers ready for a repeat?
itunes:title: THURSDAY 3/25 - Buccaneers ready for a repeat?
description:
Bucs GM Jason Licht a busy man this offseason. Thursday he locked up Ndamukong Suh (0:08) for the 2020 season, while also signing Donovan Smith to a contract extension. In running back news, Damien Williams (0:29) headed to the Windy City, while James White (0:43) will remain with the Patriots. TY Hilton (1:30) ready to run it back with the Colts. Bills GM Brandon Beane (1:49) talks about a long-term deal with Josh Allen. And we have all the latest news from pro days

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
